metadata.dc:author: Fergusson, A
Lanz, R
metadata.dc:description: This essay deals with critique of the "Modern Reason". Also, it aims to promote the debate about ethical and political issues of our technological/eco-depredating and environmentally unsound model of development. We argue about ecology like a new knowledge point of view, from which to define criteria for the reformulation of the environment/society relationship, in a postmodern context.
metadata.dc:title: Ecología y posmodernidad. Un enfoque ético.
[Ecology and postmodernity. An ethical point of view].
